entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
